meta.label: Edit dataset records
meta.description: Webapp to edit records of a dataset and maintain an editlog dataset
meta.comments: icon must be one of the FontAwesome 3.2.1 icons, complete list here at https://fontawesome.com/v3.2.1/icons/

params.name: editschema
params.label: Edit-Schema
params.defaultValue:
[
    {"name": "Name", "type": "string", "editable_type": "key", "editable": false},
    {"name": "Some number", "type": "float", "editable": false},
    {"name": "Display String", "type": "string", "editable": false},
    {"name": "Editable column", "type": "boolean", "editable": true},
]
